title: Introducing Beoplay A6
description:
BeoPlay A6 is a one-point music system designed to fit an ever-changing daily life and give you flexibility to live with and experience music just the way you want to. A musical companion that fills your life with spectacular sound, and matches any interior and style. 
·       Innovative acoustics fills the entire room with great sound

·       Fully flexible, to fit your style and daily habits

·       Easy and intuitive music control directly on BeoPlay A6
